text: ehi væsiyan nosælakillen siti mohotaka ohu nagarayata pivisiya. tama parsavayen vu keneku ha ohuge saturangen keneku gaha mara gatha. evita tama parsavaye pudgalaya tama saturangen keneku vu ayata erehi va ohugen udav pætiya. evita ohu(musa) ohuta paharak gæsiya. evita ohu veta (maranaya) tindu viya. ‘meya seyitange kriyavaki. niyata vasayenma ohu nomaga yavana pæhædili saturaki’ yæyi ohu pævasiya
